Pilot.name: Kristian Raupach
Pilot.Background: The son of a railway station manager in Königsberg, Kristian Raupach grew up watching freight trains vanish toward the east. he volunteered for the Luftwaffe shortly after finishing school, seeking adventure and to serve the Reich from above. he had no formal aviation experience but scored highly in spatial recognition and mathematics. During training, he developed a reputation for precise formation flying. A friend from his training unit was killed in a crash, which left a lasting impression on Kristian Raupach.
